name: The Rogue Bike
description:
Meet DASH!!

Dash was riding a bike and somehow his bike has gone rogue. Dash needs your help to make sure that he does not get himself/others hurt and he reaches a safe spot.

Guide him safely through various traps, clear obstructions from his path, and shift his surroundings to create a safe passage.

Solve environment puzzles in a fantasy world, find multiple pathways through the game, and collect stars to experience this fast thrilling environment.

You are Dash's only Chance, and your imagination is the key to his Safety. Help Dash from dashing.

Rogue Bike highlights:

- Over 40 paths to explore (and more coming with updates)

- Environment puzzles where you shape the path, move obstacles, use elevators, interact with objects and more to clear Dash's way

- Visuals optimized for the most powerful Android Devices

- Quality design from award-winning developer

New Feature Added:

Now record your game and show the world how its done!! Brag about it on social media and challenge your friends.
